original: @ga  @#/_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa myur du sgrub
analyzed: @ga  @#/_/dpal 'khor lo sdom pa myur du sgrub

analyzed: b+ha ra sa d+ha nam na ma/_bod skad du/_dpal 'khor lo sdom pa myur du sgrub pa zhes bya

analyzed: ba'i thabs/_dpal bde chen ye shes la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/sems bskyed tshhad
translated: Homage to the glorious gnosis of great bliss!🔽With the preliminaries of generating bodhicitta,

original: med sngon 'gro bas/_/chos rnams stong pa nyid du sgom/_/stong pa'i ngang las🔽rang nyid kyi/_/spyi gtshug yi ge 'bru dkar las/_/'khor lo dkar po rtshibs
analyzed: med sngon 'gro bas/_/chos rnams stong pa nyid du sgom/_/stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid kyi/_/spyi gtshug yi ge 'bru dkar las/_/'khor lo dkar po rtshibs
translated: Meditate on all phenomena as emptiness.🔽From the syllable hūṃ at the crown of my head,🔽A white four-spoked wheel arises.🔽In its center, upon a lotus, sun, and moon,

original: bzhir gyur/_/de'i lte ba pad ma dang nyi zla'i steng /_/hum dkar bam dmar las 'od
analyzed: bzhir gyur/_/de'i lte ba pad ma dang nyi zla'i steng /_/hum dkar bam dmar las 'od
translated: From white hūṃ and red vaṃ, light radiates

original: 'phros pas/_/srid gsum gyi sems can bde mchog dkar po'i go 'phangs la bkod/_/
analyzed: 'phros pas/_/srid gsum gyi sems can bde mchog dkar po'i go 'phangs la bkod/_/
translated: And establishes the beings of the three existences in the state of white Cakrasaṃvara.🔽The light gathers back in and becomes the white father and red mother,

original: 'od zer tshhur 'dus yab dkar yum dmar du gyur la/_/bde chen lha mo sku mdog
analyzed: 'od zer tshhur 'dus yab dkar yum dmar du gyur la/_/bde chen lha mo sku mdog
translated: The goddess of great bliss, white in color,

original: dkar/_/g.yas gri gug g.yon thod khrag snams la kha ka ka dang bcas pa bzhi/_/rtshibs
analyzed: dkar/_/g.yas gri gug g.yon thod khrag snams la kha ka ka dang bcas pa bzhi/_/rtshibs
translated: White, with a flaying knife in the right hand and a skull cup filled with blood in the left hand, with a hissing sound.🔽Think that they are on top of the spokes of the wheel.

original: kyi steng du bsam par bya/_/'khor lo'i rtshibs kyi rtshe la la bzhi la/_/ye shes me
analyzed: kyi steng du bsam par bya/_/'khor lo'i rtshibs kyi rtshe la la bzhi la/_/ye shes me
translated: On the spokes of the wheel, on each of the four sides, is a wisdom fire blazing,

original: dpung 'bar ba yis/_/gsang ba snyoms 'jug gi dang kho na nyid phyag chen gyi mchod pas/
analyzed: dpung 'bar ba yis/_/gsang ba snyoms 'jug gi dang kho na nyid phyag chen gyi mchod pas/
translated: with the secret offering of union and the offering of the great seal of suchness.

original: bstan 'gyur_rgyud/
analyzed: bstan 'gyur_rgyud/
translated: The tantra says:🔽From the union of the father and mother,

original: yab yum snyoms 'jug sbyor 'tshhams nas/_/byang sems dkar la dmar
analyzed: yab yum snyoms 'jug sbyor 'tshhams nas/_/byang sems dkar la dmar
translated: the white bodhicitta with a red glow🔽falls as a stream from the crown of one’s head.

original: mdangs chags/_/chu rgyun rang gi spyi gtshug zug_/'khor gyi lha mo bzhi kha to yab kyi
analyzed: mdangs chags/_/chu rgyun rang gi spyi gtshug zug_/'khor gyi lha mo bzhi kha to yab kyi
translated: The four goddesses of the retinue enter into union with the father,

original: tshhul du snyoms 'jug byas pas/_/gsang gnas nas byang sems rgyun rnams babs/_/
analyzed: tshhul du snyoms 'jug byas pas/_/gsang gnas nas byang sems rgyun rnams babs/_/
translated: and the stream of bodhicitta falls from their secret places.

original: rang gi spyi gtshug gcig tu gyur nas ni/_/gnas spyi bo mgrin pa la snying kha lte ba bzhir babs
analyzed: rang gi spyi gtshug gcig tu gyur nas ni/_/gnas spyi bo mgrin pa la snying kha lte ba bzhir babs
translated: It falls into one’s crown, and then falls to the four places: the crown, the throat, the heart, and the navel.

original: pas sdig sgrib dag_/'khor lo myur 'khor nad gdon rnams/_/bcad dang gtubs pas me dpung bsregs/_/rlung gis rang bzhin med par gtor/_/
analyzed: pas sdig sgrib dag_/'khor lo myur 'khor nad gdon rnams/_/bcad dang gtubs pas me dpung bsregs/_/rlung gis rang bzhin med par gtor/_/
translated: The wheel spins quickly, cutting and chopping the illnesses and evil spirits, burning them in a bonfire, and the wind scatters them into nonexistence.

original: chu rgyun 'khor lo me dpung rlung /_/de la ma yengs gsang sngags bzlas/_/
analyzed: chu rgyun 'khor lo me dpung rlung /_/de la ma yengs gsang sngags bzlas/_/
translated: Do not be distracted from the wheel of water, the bonfire, and the wind, and recite the secret mantra.

original: dmigs pa stod na rmi lam 'byongs/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku rang shar 'byung /_/
analyzed: dmigs pa stod na rmi lam 'byongs/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku rang shar 'byung /_/
translated: If you visualize this in the upper part of the body, you will master dreams, and the saṃbhogakāya will arise naturally.🔽That is the wheel of the body.

original: de ni sku yi 'khor lo'o/_/de nas mgrin par bru dmar las/_/'khor lo
analyzed: de ni sku yi 'khor lo'o/_/de nas mgrin par bru dmar las/_/'khor lo
translated: Then, in the throat, from the red syllable bhrūṃ,🔽on a red wheel, lotus, and sun, a red hūṃ and vaṃ

original: dmar dang pad nyi yi/_/steng du hum dang bam dmar las/_/'od 'phros gong
analyzed: dmar dang pad nyi yi/_/steng du hum dang bam dmar las/_/'od 'phros gong
translated: emit light, and the emanation and reabsorbing are done as before.🔽In the center, Cakrasaṃvara father and mother

original: bzhin spro bsdu bya/_/dbus su bde mchog yab yum ni/_/pad+ma ra ga'i mdog
analyzed: bzhin spro bsdu bya/_/dbus su bde mchog yab yum ni/_/pad+ma ra ga'i mdog
translated: are the color of coral,

original: 'dra ba/_/rus pa thod pa skam rlon brgyan/_/gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa'o//
analyzed: 'dra ba/_/rus pa thod pa skam rlon brgyan/_/gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa'o//
translated: adorned with bone ornaments and dry and fresh skulls, and have the expression of the nine moods.🔽In the four directions are the goddesses with flaying knives and skulls,

original: phyogs bzhir lha mo gri thod can/_/mdog dmar kha tam bcas pa'o/_/rtshibs kyi
analyzed: phyogs bzhir lha mo gri thod can/_/mdog dmar kha tam bcas pa'o/_/rtshibs kyi
translated: red, holding khaṭvāṅgas.

original: ram las gong bzhin du/_/ye shes me 'bar mchod pas mnyes/_/gtsho 'khor
analyzed: ram las gong bzhin du/_/ye shes me 'bar mchod pas mnyes/_/gtsho 'khor
translated: As before, from RAM, the fire of timeless awareness blazes,🔽and the retinue is pleased by the offering.🔽The stream of red bodhicitta descends from the union of the father and mother

original: yab yum sbyor 'tshhams nas/_/byang sems dmar ba'i chu rgyun byung /_/mgrin
analyzed: yab yum sbyor 'tshhams nas/_/byang sems dmar ba'i chu rgyun byung /_/mgrin
translated: and fills up to the throat.

original: pa man chad khengs pa yis/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib dag par bsam/_/chu rgyun🔽'khor lo dmar po me dpung rlung /_/snying po bzlas par khyad par sngar dang med/_/
analyzed: pa man chad khengs pa yis/_/nad gdon sdig sgrib dag par bsam/_/chu rgyun 'khor lo dmar po me dpung rlung /_/snying po bzlas par khyad par sngar dang med/_/
translated: Think that the sickness, spirits, negativities, and obscurations are purified.🔽The stream of bodhicitta is a red wheel, a mass of fire and wind.🔽The recitation of the essence mantra is the same as before.

original: dmar ba khong pa'i nang me'i 'obs ltar bsam/_/gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po'o/_/
analyzed: dmar ba khong pa'i nang me'i 'obs ltar bsam/_/gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po'o/_/
translated: The red wheel is in the center of the body, like a pit of fire.

original: rang gi thugs kyis 'khor lo sngon po ni/_/snying khar bye sngon bai dur mdog_/rno
analyzed: rang gi thugs kyis 'khor lo sngon po ni/_/snying khar bye sngon bai dur mdog_/rno
translated: The blue wheel of one’s mind is in the heart, the color of lapis lazuli.🔽It is a sharp, four-spoked wheel with a lotus in the center.

original: ngar ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtshibs bzhi pa lte ba pad+ma bsam/_/nyi zla 'jigs byed dus
analyzed: ngar ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtshibs bzhi pa lte ba pad+ma bsam/_/nyi zla 'jigs byed dus
translated: Upon the sun and moon, Bhairava and Kālarātri,🔽from the emanation and re-absorption of the hūṃ and vajra,

original: mtshhan steng /_/hum dang rdo rje'i spro bsdu las/_/bde mchog sngon po yum dmar
analyzed: mtshhan steng /_/hum dang rdo rje'i spro bsdu las/_/bde mchog sngon po yum dmar
translated: is blue Cakrasaṃvara with red mother.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa myur du sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i thabs/
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa myur du sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i thabs/
translated: The Means for Swiftly Accomplishing the Glorious Cakrasaṃvara

original: zhing /_/drag po'i rang bzhin 'khor bcas bsgom/_/rtshibs bzhi'i rtshe la la me
analyzed: zhing /_/drag po'i rang bzhin 'khor bcas bsgom/_/rtshibs bzhi'i rtshe la la me
translated: and meditate on the fierce nature of the father and mother with their retinue.🔽On the four sides of the skull cup, blue-black fire with the sound of whooshing and popping blazes.

original: dpung sngo nag 'ur sgra thug sgra dang bcas pa 'bar/_/yab yum snyoms 'jug rgyud bskul
analyzed: dpung sngo nag 'ur sgra thug sgra dang bcas pa 'bar/_/yab yum snyoms 'jug rgyud bskul
translated: The father and mother are aroused through union and

original: nas/_/zag med bde ba cher rgyas shing /_/hum phat gad mo 'brug stong sgrogs/_/
analyzed: nas/_/zag med bde ba cher rgyas shing /_/hum phat gad mo 'brug stong sgrogs/_/
translated: the great bliss of the undefiled increases. They laugh with the sound of “hum phat” like a thousand dragons roaring.

original: sbyor 'tshhams byang sems 'thing shun mdog_/snying kha man chad khengs pa yis/_/
analyzed: sbyor 'tshhams byang sems 'thing shun mdog_/snying kha man chad khengs pa yis/_/
translated: The bodhicitta of the union melts and fills below the heart center with a blue-green color.🔽The mental sickness, bad spirits, negativities, and obscurations are purified.

original: sems kyi nad gdon sdig sgrib dag_/khyad par gdon dang zhe sdang rnams/_/
analyzed: sems kyi nad gdon sdig sgrib dag_/khyad par gdon dang zhe sdang rnams/_/
translated: In particular, the bad spirits and anger are

original: 'khor los stubs shing me dpung bsregs/_/ye shes rlung gis gdengs par bya/_/🔽byang sems chu rgyun drag po yis/_/sdig sgrib nad gdon thams cad thal ba'i ri bo la chu
analyzed: 'khor los stubs shing me dpung bsregs/_/ye shes rlung gis gdengs par bya/_/ byang sems chu rgyun drag po yis/_/sdig sgrib nad gdon thams cad thal ba'i ri bo la chu
translated: crushed by the wheel and burned in the fire. The wisdom wind fan blows.🔽The strong stream of bodhicitta washes away all the negativities, obscurations, sickness, and bad spirits like a waterfall on a mountain of ash.

original: rgyun babs pa bzhin bkru/_/gti mug dang tshhad pa'i nad zhi bar byed pa ba la/_/spyi gtshug
analyzed: rgyun babs pa bzhin bkru/_/gti mug dang tshhad pa'i nad zhi bar byed pa ba la/_/spyi gtshug
translated: The sickness of ignorance and jealousy is pacified.

original: sku yi 'khor lo dkar po ga bur gyi chu rgyun dang bcas pa bskor/_/dbang du sdud pa dang 'dod🔽chags dang grang nad la/_/mgrin pa gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po lcags bsreg pa bzhin dang zangs zhun lta bu bskor/_/gdon bgegs zhe sdang bad kan la/_/snying kha thugs kyi
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo dkar po ga bur gyi chu rgyun dang bcas pa bskor/_/dbang du sdud pa dang 'dod chags dang grang nad la/_/mgrin pa gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po lcags bsreg pa bzhin dang zangs zhun lta bu bskor/_/gdon bgegs zhe sdang bad kan la/_/snying kha thugs kyi
translated: The white body wheel with a stream of camphor water is turned for subduing and for passion.🔽For the gdon spirit, obstacles, hatred, and phlegm disorders, the red speech wheel at the throat is turned like a burning iron or like molten copper.

original: 'khor lo chu rgyun sngon po me sngon nag 'bar ba bskor/_/rbad gtong ngan pa bzlog pa la/_/🔽sa bon hum las 'od zer lcags kyu zhags pa yis/_/gnod byed bkug la 'khor🔽los stubs/_/mes bsregs rlung gis gtor bar bya/_/lha rnams zhal ni phyir
analyzed: 'khor lo chu rgyun sngon po me sngon nag 'bar ba bskor/_/rbad gtong ngan pa bzlog pa la/_/ sa bon hum las 'od zer lcags kyu zhags pa yis/_/gnod byed bkug la 'khor los stubs/_/mes bsregs rlung gis gtor bar bya/_/lha rnams zhal ni phyir
translated: For the black magic of killing and averting evil, the blue mind wheel at the heart is turned with a stream of blue water and a blazing black fire.🔽The seed syllable HUM emits light rays in the form of hooks and lassos that summon the harm-doers. They are crushed by the wheels, burned by the fire, and scattered by the wind.

original: bstan la/_/snying po'i rjes su ma ra ya/_/btags pa bzlas pas dam nyams
analyzed: bstan la/_/snying po'i rjes su ma ra ya/_/btags pa bzlas pas dam nyams
translated: The faces of the deities are turned outward, and the essence mantra is followed by MARAYA.

original: sgrol/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/_/bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bdun
analyzed: sgrol/_/sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/_/bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bdun
translated: The recitation liberates the violators of the sacred pledge.

original: bdun gyis/_/sa rnams g.yo zhing zhi rgyas dbang drag gi las rnams 'grub/_/
analyzed: bdun gyis/_/sa rnams g.yo zhing zhi rgyas dbang drag gi las rnams 'grub/_/
translated: On the seventh, the earth quakes and the activities of pacifying, increasing, controlling, and wrath are accomplished.

original: bcu bzhi'i sa rnams rdzogs byed pa'i/_/bde mchog nye bar sgrub pa 'di la 'bad/_/
analyzed: bcu bzhi'i sa rnams rdzogs byed pa'i/_/bde mchog nye bar sgrub pa 'di la 'bad/_/
translated: On the fourteenth, strive in this close practice of Heruka, which perfects the stages.🔽I entrust this life-force of the dakinis to you, Shangpa Düdul Gup.

original: mkha' 'gro'i srog snying shangs pa rdu gu pa khyod la gtod/_/chig rgyud las ma spel tshi ti'i
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i srog snying shangs pa rdu gu pa khyod la gtod/_/chig rgyud las ma spel tshi ti'i
translated: Do not proliferate it beyond a single lineage.

original: pho brang du/_/rang srog ltar he sgrub 'di dang bla ma gces par zung /_/ni gu ma nga rang
analyzed: pho brang du/_/rang srog ltar he sgrub 'di dang bla ma gces par zung /_/ni gu ma nga rang
translated: In the palace of Tsit, cherish this practice of Heruka as you would your own life and the guru.🔽Meditate on Niguma, the Lady of Illusion,🔽bestowing blessings on the crown of your head, and supplicate.

original: byin rlob spyi bor sgoms la gsol ba thob/_/sa bcu lam lnga'i rim pa rnams/_/
analyzed: byin rlob spyi bor sgoms la gsol ba thob/_/sa bcu lam lnga'i rim pa rnams/_/

original: mos gus stobs kyis sgrod par bya/_la/_/'di ni gsang sngags mthar thug mchog_/
analyzed: mos gus stobs kyis sgrod par bya/_la/_/'di ni gsang sngags mthar thug mchog_/

analyzed: 'gro ni gu mas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_nga kha/_zla ba gang la mkhag ma bab_kha//_//
